mapper.update: update oss_multipart set upload_id = #{uploadId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, part_number = #{partNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, e_tag = #{eTag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bucket_name = #{bucketName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, object_key = #{objectKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, upload_id, part_number, e_tag, bucket_name, object_key, create_time from oss_multipart
